column1: #: name: Cut-flow table for 700 GeV (wino LSP) 2017

column4: after the application of each search requirement for three chargino lifetime hypotheses ($\tau = 0.3$
column8: \text{GeV}{}$ in the case of a purely wino neutralino LSP. Excepting the final three
column9: the requirements listed are cumulative such that only the events and objects passing a given requirement are considered in subsequent requirements. In the case of the final three requirements on the number of tracker layers with measurement
column10: these are exclusive signal category selections where only one is applied for each category. The uncertainties are only the statistical uncertainties resulting from the sizes of the generated samples.
